page.title: 03Annual events in Ripe
page.content: Our Spring flower show is the first event of the year. Depending on the severity of the Winter frosts and the date of Easter the show is held in March or April. During the preceding months the committee has organised the various flower classes, the cookery and the children's section. The brochures have been printed and handed out to families in Ripe and the surrounding villages. When the day arrives the entries are taken to the village hall where they are put on display. Then the judges come and sort out the winners. Then a quick snack lunch is eaten and we all troup back to the hall to see what we have won. Prize money is collected and spent again on the teas and sideshows. After the silver cups have been given to the winners we collect our entries and return home.
